words.ex: She was keenly aware of the risks involved.
He kept the letter as a cherished keepsake.
The topic was far beyond his ken.
The teacher’s passion kindled the students’ interest.
There was a strong sense of kinship among the group.
They bought snacks from a small kiosk near the station.
She has a knack for solving complex problems.
The story’s villain was portrayed as a cunning knave.
You need to knead the dough for at least ten minutes.
The announcement sounded the knell for the old system.
Shared challenges helped knit the team together.
The price increase had a knock‑on effect on the entire market.
Kudos to everyone who contributed to the project.
